original_text: Egypt is like a beautiful young cow. But an army from the north will attack her, like a crowd of flies that bite. Egypt is like a beautiful young cow. But an army from the north will attack her, like a crowd of flies that bite. Egypt is like a beautiful young cow. But an army from the north will attack her, like a crowd of flies that bite. Egypt is like a beautiful young cow.
korean_text: 애굽은 심히 아름다운 암송아지일지라도 북으로부터 쇠파리 떼가 줄곧 오리라

sentences.original_text: Egypt is like a beautiful young cow
But an army from the north will attack her
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 북방에서 온 군대가 그녀를 공격할 것이다
